name: Buknight
description:
# 

This game is an Entry for the Metroidvania month 18 gamejam!

I wish this game was in a more complete state, but it is currently a prototype! Because of work and others, I underestimated the time it would took to develop a reasonable metroidvania! However, participating in the gamejam made me get back on track and start doing more gamedev stuff, which is cool! 

I plan on finishing development for this game since I want to ACTUALY finish a game, doesn't need to be super complex, but a good experience! The prototype doesn't have much besides me testing some mechanics, but if you enjoyed them, let me know what is scuffed and what isn't! :)
